wikipedia_page.main: Robert Cunyngham Brown  (1867 – 7 October 1945) was a British psychologist and medical administrator.He was a commissioner of the Board of Control for Lunacy and Mental Deficiency.

response: * Robert Cunyngham Brown (1867–1945), British psychologist and medical administrator

link_mentions.page: Board of Control for Lunacy and Mental Deficiency
response: * In 1926 due to Robert Welsh Braithwaite's retirement, Robert Cunyngham Brown was appointed a commissioner.The Times, Friday, Oct 22, 1926; pg. 18; Issue 44409; col D
